import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Badge, Card, Button, Form, InputGroup, FormText } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Formik } from 'formik'; import * as Yup from 'yup'; import '../style/Checkout.css'; const schema = Yup.object().shape({ name: Yup.string().required('Your name is missing.'), phone: Yup.string().matches(/^\d{8}$/, 'Invalid Phone Number').required('Phone number is missing.'), address: Yup.string().required('Shipping address is missing.'), notes: Yup.string().max(100, "Maximum 100 characters allowed.") }); const initialize = { name: '', phone: '', address: '', payment: 'Cash', notes: '', } const CheckoutPage = () => { return ( <>

Checkout form

{ alert(JSON.stringify(values, null, 2)); }} > { ({ values, errors, handleSubmit, handleChange, handleBlur}) => ( <>

Billing address

Name {errors.name} Phone Number +852 {errors.phone} Address {errors.address}

Payment

Notes {100 - values.notes.length >= 0 ? `Remaining Characters: ${100 - values.notes.length}`: `${errors.notes} Current characters: ${values.notes.length}.`}
) }

Your cart 9

  • Product name
    Brief description
    $12
) } export default CheckoutPage;
